instructions: Just finished my first marathon! Feeling exhausted but proud. #RunningGoals
originals: Congratulations! That's an amazing achievement. How long did you train for it?
synthetics: Congratulations on completing your first marathon! That’s impressive. It must have been tough to train for that long. You’re doing great. #RunningGoals I’m always here to listen if you need any advice or support. Keep going, you can do it!
